sentences.sentence: You can get that paper at your local newsagents shop.
sentences.translation: 你可以在当地的报刊处买到那份报纸。

sentences.sentence: “I saw it in my local newsagents, ” said Nick Clegg, “and I laughed out loud immediately”
sentences.translation: Nick Clegg说：“我在地方报亭看到了这则消息，我立即大笑起来。”

sentences.sentence: The latest edition of the official monthly magazine is now available at the club stores, on-line or in all good newsagents.
sentences.translation: 最新一期的俱乐部月刊已经在俱乐部商店发售啦！欢迎网上或者到报刊亭购买。
